SA1.name: IS_USER_FROM_EBAY_HALF
SA1.description: PLATS01563353. Half.Com conversion. Set to 1 if user visited any converted half.com V3 page. Used by SiteCatalyst to track if users visiting non-converted page came from converted page.

SA2.name: NOT_CONFIRMED_USER
SA2.description: PLATS02431702/e453. EBX Not Confirmed Flag. 1 if User has not yet confirmed their emails for eBay.

SA4.name: DE_UA_NOT_AGREED_USER
SA4.description: PLATS02431702/e453. EBX DE UA Flag. 1 if User has not agreed to user agreement for DE.

SA8.name: SESSION_EBX_SEARCH_REDIRECT
SA8.description: PLATS04764152 e485. 1 if Session Opt-Out ExpressSearchRedirection for Express Traffic Drivers 2.

SA10.name: SEARCH_RESULTS_VIEW_MODE_1
SA10.description: PLATS02370964. EBX search-result display prefs. List|Pic|etc - bit 1.

SA20.name: MOTORS_FITMENT_SHOW_JITM
SA20.description: PLATS02370964. EBX search-result display prefs. List|Pic|etc- bit 2

SA40.name: SEARCH_RESULTS_PER_PAGE_LIST_VIEW_1
SA40.description: PLATS02370964. EBX search-result display prefs. No. of items per page in List View - bit 1.

SA80.name: SEARCH_RESULTS_PER_PAGE_LIST_VIEW_2
SA80.description: PLATS02370964. EBX search-result display prefs. No. of items per page in List View - bit 2.

SA100.name: SEARCH_RESULTS_PER_PAGE_LIST_VIEW_3
SA100.description: PLATS02370964. EBX search-result display prefs. No. of items per page in List View - bit 3.

SA200.name: SEARCH_RESULTS_PER_PAGE_PIC_VIEW_1
SA200.description: PLATS02370964. EBX search-result display prefs. No. of items per page in Pic View - bit 1.

SA400.name: SEARCH_RESULTS_PER_PAGE_PIC_VIEW_2
SA400.description: PLATS02370964. EBX search-result display prefs. No. of items per page in Pic View - bit 2.

SA800.name: SEARCH_RESULTS_PER_PAGE_PIC_VIEW_3
SA800.description: PLATS02370964. EBX search-result display prefs. No. of items per page in Pic View - bit 3.

SA1000.name: EASY_CHECKOUT_ENABLED
SA1000.description: PLATS04220320 e475: Indicates if the user has seen the new easy checkout page in the current session or not.

SA2000.name: AD_CONTROLLER_THROTTLE
SA2000.description: PLATS04485590 e477. Sunshine Project - Phase 1. Set by HP to 1 if JS should call Ad Controller.

SA10000.name: MOTORS_2_BETA
SA10000.description: PLATS06096932 e497. Limited TTL bit-flag to direct users to Motors 2.0 or not. Can be re-purposed when Motors 2.0 fully LTS.

SA20000.name: FINDING2_PIC_SIZE_1
SA20000.description: PLATS06490718 e507. Bit 1 of a 2-bit enum to spec session picture size of Finding 2.0 search result.

SA40000.name: FINDING2_PIC_SIZE_2
SA40000.description: PLATS06490718 e507. Bit 2 of a 2-bit enum to spec session picture size of Finding 2.0 search result.

PA1.name: RICH_MEDIA_OPTED
PA1.description: PLATS01910630: Set to 1 if user prefers to receive rich media content (e.g., Flash).

PA2.name: VI_SHOW_DETAILS
PA2.description: PLATS02905972 e451. Set to 1 if user prefers to Show Details on VI. Default to 0 which is Hide Details.

PA4.name: BROWSER_TIER_BIT1
PA4.description: PLATS04018998 e473. Set to 1 if client has tier1 browser and 0 for Unset. Bit 4 and Bit 5 must be 0.

PA8.name: BROWSER_TIER_BIT2
PA8.description: PLATS04018998 e473. Set to 1 and Bit 3 and Bit 5 are set to 0, client has tier2 browser if Bit 3 is 1 and Bit 5 is 0 then it is tier 3 browser.

PA10.name: BROWSER_TIER_BIT3
PA10.description: PLATS04276534 e475. Changed the values from PLATS04018998. Set to 1 and Bit 3 and Bit 4 are 0, client has tier4 browser.

PA20.name: PERSISTENT_EBX_SEARCH_REDIRECT
PA20.description: PLATS04764008 e485. 1 if Persistent Opt-Out ExpressSearchRedirection for Express Traffic Drivers 2.

PA40.name: PERSISTENT_EBX_SEARCH_OPTOUT
PA40.description: PLATS04869942 e485. Set to 0 if core HP user opts-out of searching Express.

PA80.name: MOTORS_HP_TABS
PA80.description: PLATS06122784 e497. Motors HP tab preference.

SA4000.name: SURVEY_SHOWN
SA4000.description: PLATS06434440 e505. Key flow exit survey. 1 if survey previously shown.

PA200.name: BID_MANAGER_ELIG
PA200.description: PLATS06435688 e505. 1 if user can be shown Bid Manager on VI.

SA8000.name: HAS_PAYPAL_EMAIL
SA8000.description: PLATS06508400 e503. 1 if user has paypal email ID regardless of status. Set during signin. Consumed by myeBay.

SA200000.name: BID_O_MATIC_ROI_TAG
SA200000.description: PLATS06931296 e506. 1 if Bid-O-Matic ROI tag previously dropped.

PA100.name: SEARCH_TIP_BUBBLE
PA100.description: PLATS06305146 e499. Set to 1 if user opts-out of search tip bubbles.

SA80000.name: SHOW_EDIT_ON_SRP
SA80000.description: 0x00080000 = PLATS06629240 e505. 1 if Edit layer should be displayed over Search Results page.

SA100000.name: BROWSER_CACHED_PAGE
SA100000.description: PLATS06646706 e505. 1 if browser cached page. Site Speed Gauge.

PA400.name: FINDING2_R2_OPTOUT
PA400.description: PLATS06537784 e507. Set to 1 if user opts out of Finding 2.0 Release 2 experience (in favor of Classic search) even if part of AB test group.

PA800.name: MOTORS2_OPTOUT
PA800.description: PLATS07232668 e513. Set to 1 if user opts-out of Motors 2.0 experience.

PA1000.name: IS_MEMETRICS_USER
PA1000.description: 0x00001000 = PLATS07242370 e515. Set to 1 if user is part of CCHP Memetrics test base.

SA1000000.name: PLAYGROUND_OPT_IN
SA1000000.description: PLATS07715064 e517. Set to 1 if user opts to stay in Playground site. First needed by Finding 2.0.

PA2000.name: F2_LANDING_OPT_OUT
PA2000.description: PLATS07715064 e517. Set to 1 if user opts-out of Finding 2.0 landing page.

PA10000.name: FLASH_COOKIE_ENABLED
PA10000.description: PLATS08319868 e519. Set to 1 if browser supports Flash cookie.

PA20000.name: USER_MACHINE_TAG_1
PA20000.description: PLATS08399112 e519. Bit 1 of a 4-bit partition key for user_machine_tag table of Known Good project.

PA40000.name: USER_MACHINE_TAG_2
PA40000.description: PLATS08399112 e519. Bit 2 of a 4-bit partition key for user_machine_tag table of Known Good project.

PA80000.name: USER_MACHINE_TAG_3
PA80000.description: PLATS08399112 e519. Bit 3 of a 4-bit partition key for user_machine_tag table of Known Good project.

PA100000.name: USER_MACHINE_TAG_4
PA100000.description: PLATS08399112 e519. Bit 4 of a 4-bit partition key for user_machine_tag table of Known Good project.

SA400000.name: EBAY_INDIA_VALID_CART
SA400000.description: PLATS06944054 e515. For ebay.in shopping cart. 1 if persistent cart is applicable to this session since ebay.in shopping cart is session-only.

SA2000000.name: SHOW_PAYPAL_IN_REG
SA2000000.description: PLATS07232556 e527. 1 if to show Paypal link on Standalone registration page. Not R/W by JS per PCR sidebar.

SA4000000.name: SHOW_PAYPAL_IN_BIDCONFIRM
SA4000000.description: PLATS07232556 e527. 1 if to show Paypal link on BidConfirm page given a session. Show only once per session. Not used by JS per PCR sidebar.

PA4000.name: SHOW_PAYPAL_IN_BIDCONFIRM_1
PA4000.description: PLATS07232556 e527. Bit 1 of 2-bit counter to show Paypal link on BidConfirm page. Show up to 3 times only. Not used by JS per PCR sidebar. Show only once per session, as controlled by separate session bit-flag.

PA8000.name: SHOW_PAYPAL_IN_BIDCONFIRM_2
PA8000.description: PLATS07232556 e527. Bit 2 of 2-bit counter to show Paypal link on BidConfirm page. Show up to 3 times only.

PA200000.name: MYEBAY_BETA_TRACKING
PA200000.description: PLATS08498164 e523. Set to 1 if user opts in to myebay-beta program.

SA8000000.name: MYEBAY_BETA_OPTOUT
SA8000000.description: PLATS08552304 e523. 1 if user chooses to stay on old MyeBay flow for the session despite persistent opt-in to use new.

PA800000.name: FINDING2_R2_OPTIN
PA800000.description: PLATS08902472 e535. Set to 1 if user opts in to Finding 2.0 Release 2 experience from Classic search.

SA10000000.name: ONE_CLICK_BID_AGREEMENT
SA10000000.description: PLATS08608542 e525. 1 if user previously accepted 1-Click Bid User Agreement.

PA400000.name: MOTORS_2_OPTIN
PA400000.description: PLATS08895960 e535. Set to 1 if classic Motors user opts-in to Motors 2.0.

PA1000000.name: NGVI_OPTOUT
PA1000000.description: PLATS09353152 e547. Set to 1 if user opts out of NextGen VI even if part of A/B test.

PA2000000.name: BROWSER_PAGE_SIZE_1
PA2000000.description: PLATS09438202 e555 Finding. Bit 1 of browser size for four size options.

PA20000000.name: HIDE_KEYWORD_LIST_LINK
PA20000000.description: PLATS09726768 e569. 1 if to hide Keyword List link across all Finding pages.

PA4000000.name: BROWSER_PAGE_SIZE_2
PA4000000.description: PLATS09448152 e555 Finding. Bit 2 of browser size for four size options.

PA40000000.name: IS_FINDING_2_EXPERIENCE
PA40000000.description: PLATS09816742 e565. 1 if Finding 2.0 experience. Set by F2, not user preference.

SA20000000.name: USER_HAS_COUPON
SA20000000.description: PLATS09773386 e569. 1 if user has coupon.

SA80000000.name: MOTORS_2_QF_DETAIL_VIEW
SA80000000.description: 0x80000000 = PLATS09898868 e569. 1 if user prefers Motors 2.0 Detail rather than Quickfinder. Not used by JS.

PA8000000.name: NGVI_TOGGLE
PA8000000.description: PLATS09488266 e561 Buying. Toggles between VI and NGVI for A/B test members.

PA80000000.name: SHOW_NGVI_CONTEXTUAL_HELP
PA80000000.description: PLATS09865920 e567. 1 if NGVI user is shown NGVI contextual help.

S2BIT0.name: HAS_VISITED_AUCTION_ZONE
S2BIT0.description: PLATS09901706 e571. 1 if user has interacted with Auction Zone.

S2BIT1.name: COLLAPSE_AUCTION_ZONE
S2BIT1.description: PLATS09901706 e571. 1 if user prefers to collapse Auction Zone.

S2BIT2.name: HAS_VISITED_SFE_LEFT_NAV
S2BIT2.description: PLATS09901706 e571. 1 if user has visited left navigation.

P2BIT0.name: CLOSE_SFE_EDUCATION_BUBBLE
P2BIT0.description: PLATS09901706 e571. 1 if user has closed the SFE Education bubble.

S2BIT3.name: DISPLAY_MATCH_DISTANCE_POPUP
S2BIT3.description: PLATS10216122 e579. 1 if the popup has been displayed once.

S2BIT4.name: INVOKE_POPUP_COOKIE_CODE
S2BIT4.description: PLATS10216122 e579. 1 means first iteration to invoke the code which checks/sets match distance popup. 0 means the code has not been invoked if DISPLAY_MATCH_DISTANCE_POPUP is 0; 0 means the code has been invoked second time if DISPLAY_MATCH_DISTANCE_POPUP is 1.

P2BIT1.name: MOBILE_PREFERS_EBAY_MAIN
P2BIT1.description: PLATS10079320 e577. 1 if mobile user prefers eBay main site instead of mobile site.

S2BIT5.name: GEM_FALLBACK_FLAG_COOKIE
S2BIT5.description: PLATS10208442 e581. 1 means read from cookielet instead of gem.

P2BIT2.name: SCREEN_PIXEL_RESOLUTION_BIT1
P2BIT2.description: PLATS10348734 e583. Bit 1 of 4 denoting screen pixel resolution enums.

P2BIT3.name: SCREEN_PIXEL_RESOLUTION_BIT2
P2BIT3.description: PLATS10348734 e583. Bit 2 of 4 denoting screen pixel resolution enums.

P2BIT4.name: SCREEN_PIXEL_RESOLUTION_BIT3
P2BIT4.description: PLATS10348734 e583. Bit 3 of 4 denoting screen pixel resolution enums.

P2BIT5.name: SCREEN_PIXEL_RESOLUTION_BIT4
P2BIT5.description: PLATS10348734 e583. Bit 4 of 4 denoting screen pixel resolution enums.

P2BIT6.name: GEM_SYNC_LOCATOR
P2BIT6.description: PLATS10463502 e589. 1 means locator has been synced to router table.

S2BIT6.name: PASS_KNOWN_GOOD_REMEDY_FLOW
S2BIT6.description: PLATS10362934 e585. 1 if user has gone through the remedy flow for Known Good users and redirect to signin if needed.

P2BIT7.name: KG_MACHINE_TAG_FLAG
P2BIT7.description: PLATS10648514 e593. 0 means machine id is -1. Machine id will be set to a dummy value and log the CAL event.

S2BIT7.name: CCHP_EBAY_SITE_FLAG
S2BIT7.description: PLATS10723120 e603_Intl. 1 means a user choose to go to ebay site, not Kijiji site. It's set from ebay.es home page.

P2BIT8.name: BROWSER_PAGE_SIZE_3
P2BIT8.description: PLATS10788658.e609. Search Page Layout needs 16 possible layouts, so will be reusing 2 existing bits created using PLATS09438202, PLATS09448152: BROWSER_PAGE_SIZE_1 and BROWSER_PAGE_SIZE_2 and 2 new bits: BROWSER_PAGE_SIZE_3 and BROWSER_PAGE_SIZE_4

P2BIT9.name: BROWSER_PAGE_SIZE_4
P2BIT9.description: PLATS10788658.e609. Search Page Layout needs 16 possible layouts, so will be reusing 2 existing bits created using PLATS09438202, PLATS09448152: BROWSER_PAGE_SIZE_1 and BROWSER_PAGE_SIZE_2 and 2 new bits: BROWSER_PAGE_SIZE_3 and BROWSER_PAGE_SIZE_4

S2BIT13.name: INT_PAGE_COUNT_BIT1
S2BIT13.description: PLATS10869924 e611. Bit 1 of interstitial page count before user click on View PayPal transaction link. If max limit is reached, interstitial page will not be shown.

S2BIT14.name: INT_PAGE_COUNT_BIT2
S2BIT14.description: PLATS10869924 e611. Bit 2 of interstitial page count before user click on View PayPal transaction link. If max limit is reached, interstitial page will not be shown.

S2BIT15.name: INT_PAGE_COUNT_BIT3
S2BIT15.description: PLATS10869924 e611. Bit 3 of interstitial page count before user click on View PayPal transaction link. If max limit is reached, interstitial page will not be shown.

S2BIT8.name: FLASH_VER_COOKIE_BIT1
S2BIT8.description: PLATS10832568 eNA. Bit 1 of the flash version number (1-31). Subsequent pages could use this 5 bits value directly instead of executing code.

S2BIT9.name: FLASH_VER_COOKIE_BIT2
S2BIT9.description: PLATS10832568 eNA. Bit 2 of the flash version number (1-31). Subsequent pages could use this 5 bits value directly instead of executing code.

S2BIT10.name: FLASH_VER_COOKIE_BIT3
S2BIT10.description: PLATS10832568 eNA. Bit 3 of the flash version number (1-31). Subsequent pages could use this 5 bits value directly instead of executing code.

S2BIT11.name: FLASH_VER_COOKIE_BIT4
S2BIT11.description: PLATS10832568 eNA. Bit 4 of the flash version number (1-31). Subsequent pages could use this 5 bits value directly instead of executing code.

S2BIT12.name: FLASH_VER_COOKIE_BIT5
S2BIT12.description: PLATS10832568 eNA. Bit 5 of the flash version number (1-31). Subsequent pages could use this 5 bits value directly instead of executing code.

P2BIT11.name: POLICE_AUTHORIZATION_DONE
P2BIT11.description: PLATS10876938.e615. In Search APP side once a signed in user hits a PDP page it will check the bit. If the bit is unset it will check the authorization from database and will set the bit to 1 to establish that auth check is done for this user.

P2BIT12.name: USER_AUTHORIZED_AS_POLICE
P2BIT12.description: PLATS10876938.e615. In Search APP side once a signed in user hits a PDP page it will check the POLICE_AUTHORIZATION_DONE bit. If the POLICE_AUTHORIZATION_DONE bit is unset it will check the authorization from database and will set the POLICE_AUTHORIZATION_DONE bit to 1 to establish that auth check is done for this user.It will set this USER_AUTHORIZED_AS_POLICE bit based on actual authorization value.

P2BIT10.name: EBAY_COOKIE_BIT_VALUES
P2BIT10.description: PLATS10810218 e609. Whether to search the inventory on eBay or StubHub using the search area. 0 means eBay, 1 means StubHub.

S2BIT16.name: USER_HAS_COUPON_REDEEMED_OR_EXPIRED
S2BIT16.description: PLATS10984880 e615. This bit will be set on signin if user has expired or redeemed coupons.This will help to avoid calls on My Ebay for all users and on each reload of My Ebay to check for expired and redeemed coupons. Instead this will be checked only once during signin and set the session cookie bit flag and if its set then only a call will be made to My Ebay to get expired and redeemed coupons.

S2BIT17.name: EBAY_AUTHNAUTH_SIGNIN
S2BIT17.description: PLATS11026624 e615_INTL. Identify if a user has signed in using third party flow for known good project phase 2.

P2BIT16.name: SHOW_TRS_JITM_COUNT1
P2BIT16.description: PLATS11195132.e633. stores count of the number JITM shown in order to show JITM to user at most 3 sessions.

P2BIT17.name: SHOW_TRS_JITM_COUNT2
P2BIT17.description: PLATS11195132.e633. stores count of the number JITM shown in order to show JITM to user at most 3 sessions.

S2BIT18.name: SHOW_TRS_JITM_BIT
S2BIT18.description: PLATS11195132.e633. Stores one bit for the session to capture the state if JITM shown.

P2BIT13.name: FR_SEARCH_FLAG_BIT1
P2BIT13.description: PLATS11132362 e625. Indicate user search preference for France Classified site. 0 Not set, 1 All of France, 2 AUCTION, 3 CLASSFIEDS.

P2BIT14.name: FR_SEARCH_FLAG_BIT2
P2BIT14.description: PLATS11132362 e625. Indicate user search preference for France Classified site. 0 Not set, 1 All of France, 2 AUCTION, 3 CLASSFIEDS.

P2BIT15.name: USER_ELIGIBLE_FOR_SHOPPING_CART
P2BIT15.description: PLATS11153762 e627.On ViewItem Page, in order to decide whether shopping cart button needs to be displayed to the user or not during signin itself and set it in this flag.

P2BIT18.name: NGVI_THIN_OPT_IN
P2BIT18.description: PLATS11266098 e631. To track whether user has opted in to NGVI Thin View. Sample value will be ON, OFF.

S2BIT24.name: SFE_SORT_BIT1
S2BIT24.description: PLATS11398476 e635. SFE. Bit 1 of SFE sort options.

S2BIT25.name: SFE_SORT_BIT2
S2BIT25.description: PLATS11398476 e635. SFE. Bit 2 of SFE sort options.

S2BIT26.name: SFE_SORT_BIT3
S2BIT26.description: PLATS11398476 e635. SFE. Bit 3 of SFE sort options.

S2BIT27.name: SFE_SORT_BIT4
S2BIT27.description: PLATS11398476 e635. SFE. Bit 4 of SFE sort options.

S2BIT28.name: SFE_SORT_BIT5
S2BIT28.description: PLATS11398476 e635. SFE. Bit 5 of SFE sort options.

S2BIT29.name: SFE_SORT_BIT6
S2BIT29.description: PLATS11398476 e635. SFE. Bit 6 of SFE sort options.

S2BIT19.name: FTB_OPT_IN_BIT1
S2BIT19.description: PLATS11324714.e639. These bits are used to allow users to opt-in to various beta features in production. There will be 3 features listed on the landing page and each bit will track which features the user has selected via the session cookie. BIT1 is used for SRP RND Initiative, project id: 23105

S2BIT20.name: FTB_OPT_IN_BIT2
S2BIT20.description: PLATS11324714.e639. These bits are used to allow users to opt-in to various beta features in production. There will be 3 features listed on the landing page and each bit will track which features the user has selected via the session cookie for each of the projects.

S2BIT21.name: FTB_OPT_IN_BIT3
S2BIT21.description: PLATS11324714.e639. These bits are used to allow users to opt-in to various beta features in production. There will be 3 features listed on the landing page and each bit will track which features the user has selected via the session cookie for each of the projects.

S2BIT30.name: IT_CLASSIFY_OR_EBAY_BIT1
S2BIT30.description: PLATS11476776 e639_INTL. 3 bits Indicate No cookies, eBay Selected, Classifieds Selected, Motors selected, Real estate selected.

S2BIT31.name: IT_CLASSIFY_OR_EBAY_BIT2
S2BIT31.description: PLATS11476776 e639_INTL. 3 bits Indicate No cookies, eBay Selected, Classifieds Selected, Motors selected, Real estate selected.

S2BIT32.name: IT_CLASSIFY_OR_EBAY_BIT3
S2BIT32.description: PLATS11476776 e639_INTL. 3 bits Indicate No cookies, eBay Selected, Classifieds Selected, Motors selected, Real estate selected.

S2BIT22.name: IS_MEDIA_PDP_GROUPED
S2BIT22.description: PLATS11370086 e639. 1 if user chose the grouped version of Media PDP. Both 0 will default and defer to TO.

S2BIT23.name: IS_MEDIA_PDP_UNGROUPED
S2BIT23.description: PLATS11370086 e639. 1 if user chose the ungrouped version of Media PDP. Both 0 will default and defer to TO.

P2BIT19.name: FTB_OPTED_IN
P2BIT19.description: PLATS11509242.e639. This cookie bit will keep track of which beta features out of 3, user has selected to opt-in.

S2BIT42.name: TOOLBAR_FLAG_BIT1
S2BIT42.description: PLATS13937852 – Jan 2011  - bits no longer used.  PLATS11766502 e653 2 bits incidate whether old toolbar or new toolbar is installed. 00-nothing, 01-old installed, 10-new installed, 11-not used.

S2BIT43.name: TOOLBAR_FLAG_BIT2
S2BIT43.description: PLATS13937852 – Jan 2011  - bits no longer used .   PLATS11766502 e653 2 bits incidate whether old toolbar or new toolbar is installed. 00-nothing, 01-old installed, 10-new installed, 11-not used.

S2BIT33.name: GBH_LOCALE_BIT1
S2BIT33.description: PLATS11681218 e653. To indicate locale for users coming from GBH. The cookie bits will be dropped on ebay.uk and be picked up by SignIn/Registration page.

S2BIT34.name: GBH_LOCALE_BIT2
S2BIT34.description: PLATS11681218 e653. To indicate locale for users coming from GBH. The cookie bits will be dropped on ebay.uk and be picked up by SignIn/Registration page.

S2BIT35.name: GBH_LOCALE_BIT3
S2BIT35.description: PLATS11681218 e653. To indicate locale for users coming from GBH. The cookie bits will be dropped on ebay.uk and be picked up by SignIn/Registration page.

S2BIT36.name: GBH_LOCALE_BIT4
S2BIT36.description: PLATS11681218 e653. To indicate locale for users coming from GBH. The cookie bits will be dropped on ebay.uk and be picked up by SignIn/Registration page.

P2BIT20.name: USER_CONNECTION_SPEED_BIT1
P2BIT20.description: PLATS11680470 e653 The cookie value will be used for setting the suers coonection speed in JS.

P2BIT21.name: USER_CONNECTION_SPEED_BIT2
P2BIT21.description: PLATS11680470 e653 The cookie value will be used for setting the suers coonection speed in JS.

P2BIT22.name: USER_CONNECTION_SPEED_BIT3
P2BIT22.description: PLATS11697652 e653 The cookie value will be used for setting the suers coonection speed in JS.

P2BIT25.name: NGVI_THIN_OPT_OUT
P2BIT25.description: PLATS11874946.e661. This persistent cookie is to keep track if the user ever opt-out from NGVI Lite.

S2BIT37.name: PDP_COLLAPSED_BIT1
S2BIT37.description: PLATS11749630 e659. 2 bits indicate whether user choose to collapse left Navigation bar. 00-no choice, 01-collapsed,10-uncollapsed, 11-not used.

S2BIT38.name: PDP_COLLAPSED_BIT2
S2BIT38.description: PLATS11749630 e659. 2 bits indicate whether user choose to collapse left Navigation bar. 00-no choice, 01-collapsed,10-uncollapsed, 11-not used.

S2BIT39.name: PDP_VIEW_AS_BIT1
S2BIT39.description: PLATS11680128 e659 2 bits to indicate what form is used for viewing on PDP split. 00-not set, 01-list. 10-split, 11-grid

S2BIT40.name: PDP_VIEW_AS_BIT2
S2BIT40.description: PLATS11680128 e659 2 bits to indicate what form is used for viewing on PDP split. 00-not set, 01-list. 10-split, 11-grid

P2BIT24.name: BUBBLE_HELP_DISPLAY_LEFTNAV
P2BIT24.description: PLATS11818220.e659.To control display of bubble help on collapsible left nav on pdp.Will store On/OFf States.

S2BIT41.name: HAS_BML_OFFER
S2BIT41.description: PLATS11739158.e661. SignIn will set this cookie bit in the SBF cookie to indicate if the user has a BML offer or not in order to make a SOA call to the Coupon Infrastructure on View Item Page.

P2BIT26.name: EBAY_INTERNAL_FEEDBACK_40_OPTIN
P2BIT26.description: PLATS12006582 e661. store INTERNAL eBay users opt-in flag for testing new feedback4.0 flow.

P2BIT27.name: HOME_PAGE_GARDEN_VARIANT1
P2BIT27.description: PLATS12022344 e663. Search Team needs to store an int value between 0 and 7, which is 3 bits, in a persistent cookie to allow (usually anonymous) users to opt into the beta home page variants from the Garden page.

P2BIT28.name: HOME_PAGE_GARDEN_VARIANT2
P2BIT28.description: PLATS12022344 e663. Search Team needs to store an int value between 0 and 7, which is 3 bits, in a persistent cookie to allow (usually anonymous) users to opt into the beta home page variants from the Garden page.

P2BIT29.name: HOME_PAGE_GARDEN_VARIANT3
P2BIT29.description: PLATS12022344 e663. Search Team needs to store an int value between 0 and 7, which is 3 bits, in a persistent cookie to allow (usually anonymous) users to opt into the beta home page variants from the Garden page.

P2BIT32.name: DCP_OPT_IN
P2BIT32.description: PLATS12127354.e673. This bit stores 0 if User did not opt out of new DCP Page and 1 otherwise.

P2BIT35.name: MOTORS_FITMENT_SHOW_JITM_COUNT1
P2BIT35.description: PLATS12261376.e677. 2 Bits to store count so that JITM is shown to user for at most 3 sessions for Motors 2.0: Fitment search/VI enhancements.

P2BIT36.name: MOTORS_FITMENT_SHOW_JITM_COUNT2
P2BIT36.description: PLATS12261376.e677. 2 Bits to store count so that JITM is shown to user for at most 3 sessions for Motors 2.0: Fitment search/VI enhancements.

S2BIT45.name: HYBRID_RESULTS_VIEW_MODE_1

S2BIT47.description: PLATS12051434.e635.3 Bits needed to store display information for Hybrid Page.

P2BIT34.name: LIST_MESSAGE_OPT_OUT
P2BIT34.description: PLATS12191442.e677. This cookie helps in tracking if the user ever opted out of the just-in time messaging shown for Lists.

SA40000000.name: USER_HAS_LISTS
SA40000000.description: PLATS12216160. e677. USER_HAS_LISTS. Based on this bit,if set, ViewItem will make call to all User created lists.

S2BIT48.name: PASS_AUTH_VERIFICATION_FLAG
S2BIT48.description: A PLATS12087372 e675. To detnermine whether the user is accessing the ebay.com from KnownGood Machine. If it is not a KG machine, then he will be challeged and he has to clear the remedy. Before to take the remedy, this cookie will be dropped in client machine to avoid the further login.PLATS12150088 e675- Moved this from persistence P2BIT30 to session S2BIT48

S2BIT50.name: CLIENT_CONNECTION_SPEED_BIT1
S2BIT50.description: PLATS13470136 - e721 - 3 bits to store the users or clients connection speed and based on user's connection speed we would present different UI for optimized browsing. Total 3 bits are used

S2BIT51.name: CLIENT_CONNECTION_SPEED_BIT2
S2BIT51.description: PLATS13470136 - e721 - 3 bits to store the users or clients connection speed and based on user's connection speed we would present different UI for optimized browsing. Total 3 bits are used

S2BIT52.name: CLIENT_CONNECTION_SPEED_BIT3
S2BIT52.description: PLATS13470136 - e721 - 3 bits to store the users or clients connection speed and based on user's connection speed we would present different UI for optimized browsing. Total 3 bits are used

SPBIT3.name: KG_SIGNIN_VERF_FLAG
SPBIT3.description: PLATS13290390 e711.Secure Session Bit Flag, To detnermine whether the user is accessing the ebay.com from KnownGood Machine. If it is not a KG machine, then he will be challeged and he has to clear the remedy. Before to take the remedy, this cookie will be dropped in client machine to avoid the further login.

P2BIT37.name: ITEM_WINDOW_SIZE_BIT1

S2BIT53.name: IS_MYEBAY_LIST_VIEWALL
S2BIT53.description: PLATS13472062 - e723 -  Used to store user choice to expand (cookie bit value 1) or collapse (cookie bit value 0) the List section in the Left Nav of MyeBay page. This is stored per session.

P2BIT41.name: IS_OPTED_INTO_MYEBAY_BETA
P2BIT41.description: PLATS13501608 - e719 - A persistent cookie to identify whether user has opted into BETA My eBay page or not.

P2BIT42.name: SHOW_PRODUCT_TOUR

P2BIT45.name: SHOW_MYGARAGE_POPUP

P2BIT44.name: IS_OPTED_OUT_AUCTION_DEDUPE

P2BIT43.name: IS_OPTED_OUT_FOOTER_MERCH

P2BIT46.name: SHOW_MY_EBAY_WISHLIST_TOUR

S2BIT55.name: HIDE_CBT_FLOODING

S2BIT54.name: SPYGLASS_DEBUG_ENABLED
S2BIT54.description: PLATS13864198- e721 - 1 bit to identify whether spyglass session is enabled or not

P2BIT49.name: VIP_JIT_MSG_1

P2BIT50.name: VIP_JIT_MSG_2

S2BIT58.name: PAGE_REFRESH_2
